CommandResponses.info:
⚔️ **How to Setup Your Valheim Installation for This Server:** ⚔️

**1.** Install Thunderstore Mod Manager.
**2.** Open it and select Valheim → create or pick a profile for our server.
**3.** Click Get Mods and install:
     • BepInExPack for Valheim (by denikson)
       https://thunderstore.io/c/valheim/p/denikson/BepInExPack_Valheim
     • ValheimPlus Grantapher Temporary
       https://thunderstore.io/c/valheim/p/Grantapher/ValheimPlus_Grantapher_Temporary
**4.** Click Start Modded in the manager to launch Valheim.
**5.** On the main menu you should see a ValheimPlus logo.
**6.** Join The Thatch Hut → password **Golum2003**.
